turkish_example_sentence: Sen meraklı öğrenciye zor matematik sorusunu sormamış olsaydın, o utanmazdı
english_example_sentence: If you hadn't asked the curious student the difficult math question, he wouldn't have been embarrassed
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не задал любопытному студенту трудный математический вопрос, он не смутился бы
